text:
webapps/examples/build.xml 1.10, line 44 uses unset variables
${jndi.jar}:${activation.jar}:${mail.jar} in a classpath.

In my environment this causes the build to fail because of broken
javax.mail dependencies.

A fix is to copy the relevant derived properties from the
catalina/build.xml, patch is available from the URL.
creator: mak-apache-bugzilla@greenhills.co.uk

text:
I can confirm the problem.
The workaround is very easy, though: just set mail.jar and activation.jar in 
your build.properties.
creator: remm@apache.org

text:
jfclere just fixed the mail.jar one with revision 1.11,
but this leaves the jndi and activation ones still unset.
This doesn't break the build, but really ought to be addressed also.
